songs.title: Lit
songs.lyrics: Coming off a pretty long hiatus of my popular BoomTrap instrumental series, I knew that Vol 4 had to start off with a BANG. This was the 1st track I made on the compilation and it set the tone properly. High energy. Unexpected drops and signature boomtrap siren. Did a lot of side-chaining here and really just wanted it to sound like CHAOS!! High energy chaos. Like you would hear this in the most underground of underground clubs with 50 people in a mosh pit, wilding out. It's lit. On fire, literally
